testcase.name: response headers should indicate valid content encoding
testcase.failure: Failed 2 times. Collection JSON ID: b3e4e2e1-3ede-4589-abb1-d4f98ce0d5a9. Collection name: Postman Echo. Request name: Utilities / GZip Compressed Response. Stacktrace: AssertionError: expected 'content-type' response header to be 'application/json' but got 'application/json; charset=utf-8' at Object.eval sandbox-script.js:3:20).
